name: Fajar Yuda Pratama
title: Fajar Yuda Pratama Official Resume
moto: IoT Maker, WEB Programmer, Robotic Hobbies
address: Cipinang Village, Beber District, Cirebon Regency, West Java, 45172

projects.name: KRAI 2018
projects.description: with the polytechnic robotics team building the 2018 KRAI robot, 2018 was my first year in the robotics team and I was already responsible for the code of the two KRAI robots, the first robot was an automatic robot and the second was semi automatic with wireless remote control

projects.name: Parking Guide System
projects.description: With a team from PT.Nocola creating a parking Guide system supported by 221 sensors to detect the presence of vehicles in each parking slot as well as entrance and exit bars that support barcode and NFC, users can monitor the number and location of empty slots and monitor access logs in and out of parking buildings, all can be monitored on a realtime web apps

projects.name: Implementation of NI MyRIO on Segway as a Vehicle in the Campus Area
projects.description: My final diploma project is to make a self balancing scooter with an NI MyRIO controller with LabVIEW programming, of course, the segway can be balanced and run and turn well, using 2 7,2Ah batteries with 31 minutes 28 seconds of life time.

projects.name: Pineapple Maturity Monitoring with Image Processing and IoT
projects.description: Monitoring the ripeness of pineapples using an esp-cam camera connected to a raspberry, the detection results will be sent to the web via socket.io
